sources.title: False Pretenses
sources.description: A girl with no money teams up with a society man with no money with a scheme to get them both the money that they want.

metadata.Plot: Randal 'Randy' Ackers looses his family savings and the company's reserve funds in an 'easy profit scheme' and commits suicide. His widow Dianne hopes to build a new life in California but gets stuck with car trouble in Texas. To pay for the repairs, she becomes waitress Dee Dee in a diner. There the swindler, who apparently doesn't recognize Diane, recruits 'Dee Dee' as investment sales pitch assistant. Friendly local sheriff Nando, who has a crush on her, promises to help catch the trickster under his new name, unofficially as he has no cause for legal action. But more is not what is seems.
metadata.Actors: Peta Wilson, Stewart Bick, Melanie Nicholls-King
